response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit you. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will meet your needs and expectations. Considering its true worth, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $1,250,000. This offer is tailored to provide you with the best possible deal while ensuring a fair return for us. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate a transaction that benefits both parties.", "product_price": 1250000}
